title: Isobe Isobee with Nakata Yasutaka de Sourou
original_name: 磯部磯兵衛 with 中田ヤスタカで候
sinopse: DJ and music producer Yasutaka Nakata known for his work with Perfume and Kyary Pamyu Pamyu Nakata recruited the characters from Isobe Isobee Monogatari to star in a promotional video for his new single "Seiseseiseiseiseseisei."
